contexts.context: ...to listen to what the other woman was saying. She <mark>stood</mark> there letting the words fall over her, swaying the top part...
...they were uttered in toneless and monotonous voices. The couple <mark>stood</mark> still on the edge of the flower bed, and together...
...Kew he felt that something loomed up behind her words and <mark>stood</mark> vast and solid behind them; and the mist very slowly rose...
